thread.section_title: Fastport Passport Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fastport Passport | fastportpassport.com
thread.title: Amber Askew
thread.title_full: Fastport Passport reviewed by Amber Askew

author: Amber Askew
title: Amber Askew
text:
The process was extremely easy! The check lists online were very helpful. I paid for 2 day processing and had forgotten about a holiday being on Monday and they actually refunded $50 into my account. I received my passport in perfect timing along with my information. My only issue was I had emailed 3 or 4 times with no response but Domenique G responded every time and answered all my questions. She was very polite and helpful! They even sent me the tracking # so I could keep up with it.
Thanks to the entire team at Fastport Passport!
